org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.input.event

Class MouseEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.event.Event
      • org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.input.event.MouseEvent

  • public class MouseEvent
extends Event
    The MouseEvent class stores information about a mouse event

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String EVENT_DESCRIPTION
      This string is the description of this event used by the Event class
      static java.lang.String EVENT_NAME
      This string is the name of this event used by the Event class.
      boolean isLeftButton
      A boolean value representing whether the left mouse button is down at the time this event was made
      boolean isMiddleButton
      A boolean value representing whether the middle mouse button is down at the time this event was made
      boolean isRightButton
      A boolean value representing whether the right mouse button is down at the time this event was made
      double x
      The x position of the position this event occurred on the screen
      double y
      The y position of the position this event occurred on the screen

      This constructor takes the event's mouse button position of the mouse event and creates an Event

      • MouseEvent

        public MouseEvent(int button,
          double x,
          double y)
        This constructor takes the event's mouse button position of the mouse event and creates an Event
        Parameters:
        button - An integer value representing the button that is associated with this Event
        x - The x position of where this event occurred on the screen
        y - The y position of where this event occurred on the screen
